# Python
arr = ["Daffa", "Kurnia", "Fatah"]

def greeting():
    name = next((item for item in arr if item == "Daffa"), None)
    return f"Hello, {name}!"

print(greeting()) # Hello, Daffa!

<?php
// PHP
$arr = ["Daffa", "Kurnia", "Fatah"];

function greeting($arr) {
  $name = null;
  foreach ($arr as $item) {
    if ($item === "Daffa") {
      $name = $item;
      break;
    }
  }
  return "Hello, $name!";
}

echo greeting($arr); // Hello, Daffa!
?>
